Content: Hello, my ninja EX300A last night was lagging a bit in relation to the throttle. After 5 mins of riding I left it to idol and it turned off by itself, after attempting a rolling start a few times with weak success as soon as I gave it revs it switched off again now will not swap into 2nd gear, neutral and 1st only and will not start please help last service on the 25th march
